title: Form Recruitment
description: A project for HMTI Udinus to streamline the member recruitment process using an efficient online registration system built with PHP and MySQL.

title: DigiPustaka
description: A modern web application to manage a digital library's operations, including book and publisher management, and loan tracking.

title: Ecotrack
description: A smart solution for tracking environmental data, focusing on waste management and sustainability, built with the MERN stack.
